PrecisRegulations Amending the RADIOCOMMUNICATION REGULATIONS by updating the requirements necessary to qualify for a maritime service radio operator's certificate so that they are consistent with the Global Marine Distress and Safety System certification standards.

precis:
Regulations Amending the RADIOCOMMUNICATION REGULATIONS by updating the
requirements necessary to qualify for a maritime service radio operator's
certificate so that they are consistent with the Global Marine Distress and
Safety System certification standards.
